page.title: 09Horningsham Cricket Club
page.content:
Horningsham Cricket Club was founded in 1977 after the levelling of the field behind the Village Hall. It is run by a President, fourteen Vice-Presidents, an Honorary Life Member, a Chairman, a Membership Secretary, a Fixture Secretary, a Treasurer and a Scorer. There are about thirty-eight matches each season mainly against the teams of the surrounding villages. The team consists of a Captain, Vice-Captain and nine players.
At 5p.m. during each match play stops for tea which is provided by the players and members' wives.
